name: Test Simulator 2016 (Mini Ludum Dare 2016 Entry)
description:
This is a submission for the Mini Ludum Dare 2016. This game is based around studying for a school test/exam. It is randomly generated each time, so you will have to be lucky to win.

Link on Ludum Dare website: http://ludumdare.com/compo/minild-68/?action=previ...

Any feedback is welcome!
